title: NYC Subway Watch Face
summary: New York City Lovers Only. MTA signs look and feel to be a part of it.
description: Simple yet not simplistic. It took several hours to give the "NY" state of mind to this face.Displays:- Day of the week- Month, - Day of the month- Hour- Minutes- am/pm Indicator (if your phone is in 12h mode)- Battery LevelColors have been picked from official MTA website, font is standard Helvetica in Bold for DoW and standard for Month and Date..Tokens are photos of actual NYC subway tokens. Each token "gives you" 20% of battery life.I do Love NY.
descriptionHTML:
Simple yet not simplistic. It took several hours to give the "NY" state of mind to this face.

Displays:
- Day of the week
- Month,
- Day of the month
- Hour
- Minutes
- am/pm Indicator (if your phone is in 12h mode)
- Battery Level

Colors have been picked from official MTA website, font is standard Helvetica in Bold for DoW and standard for Month and Date..

Tokens are photos of actual NYC subway tokens. Each token "gives you" 20% of battery life.

I do Love NY.
comments: I love it, I'd only rather not have the battery indicator always on
Great... You can see a lot of thought went to it, very nice...
recentChanges: v1.2 Fixed shifted 1 and replaced mobile icon with proper art work
A present to NYC fanatics. If you like this face, share the love!
